nodes.text: Sector N-One was one of the twelve sectors, or zones, of the northern hemisphere of the DS-1 Orbital Battle Station. It was shaped like a large crescent slice of melon, cut in half midway and was 31 kilometers wide at the base, which formed the equator of the Death Star. It was destroyed along with the rest of the Death Star during the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY.
Notable locations within Sector N-One included:
